verses.verse: And Abraham <WH85> journeyed <WH5265> from thence toward the south <WH5045> country <WH776>, and dwelled <WH3427> between Kadesh <WH6946> and Shur <WH7793>, and sojourned <WH1481> in Gerar <WH1642>.

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> of <WH413> Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>, She is my sister <WH269>: and Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428> of Gerar <WH1642> sent <WH7971>, and took <WH3947> Sarah <WH8283>.

But God <WH430> came <WH935> to Abimelech <WH40> in a dream <WH2472> by night <WH3915>, and said <WH559> to him, Behold, thou art but a dead man <WH4191>, for the woman <WH802> which thou hast taken <WH3947>; for she is a man's <WH1167> wife <WH1166>. a man's: Heb. married to an husband
But Abimelech <WH40> had not come near <WH7126> her: and he said <WH559>, Lord <WH136>, wilt thou slay <WH2026> also a righteous <WH6662> nation <WH1471>?

Said <WH559> he not unto me, She <WH1931> is my sister <WH269>? and she <WH1931>, even <WH1571> she <WH1931> herself said <WH559>, He is my brother <WH251>: in the integrity <WH8537> of my heart <WH3824> and innocency <WH5356> of my hands <WH3709> have I done <WH6213> this. integrity: or, simplicity, or, sincerity

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him in a dream <WH2472>, Yea <WH1571>, I know <WH3045> that thou didst <WH6213> this in the integrity <WH8537> of thy heart <WH3824>; for I also withheld <WH2820> thee from sinning <WH2398> against me: therefore suffered <WH5414> I thee not to touch <WH5060> her.

Now therefore restore <WH7725> the man <WH376> his wife <WH802>; for he is a prophet <WH5030>, and he shall pray <WH6419> for thee <WH1157>, and thou shalt live <WH2421>: and if thou restore <WH7725> her not, know <WH3045> thou that thou shalt surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>, thou, and all that are thine.

Therefore Abimelech <WH40> rose early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and called <WH7121> all his servants <WH5650>, and told <WH1696> all these things <WH1697> in their ears <WH241>: and the men <WH582> were sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372>.

Then Abimelech <WH40> called <WH7121> Abraham <WH85>, and said <WH559> unto him, What hast thou done <WH6213> unto us? and what have I offended <WH2398> thee, that thou hast brought <WH935> on me and on my kingdom <WH4467> a great <WH1419> sin <WH2401>? thou hast done <WH6213> deeds <WH4639> unto me that ought not to be done <WH6213>.
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559> unto Abraham <WH85>, What <WH4100> sawest thou <WH7200>, that thou hast done <WH6213> this thing <WH1697>?

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559>, Because I thought <WH559>, Surely <WH7535> the fear <WH3374> of God <WH430> is not in this place <WH4725>; and they will slay me <WH2026> for my wife's <WH802> sake <WH1697>.
And yet indeed <WH546> she is my sister <WH269>; she is the daughter <WH1323> of my father <WH1>, but not the daughter <WH1323> of my mother <WH517>; and she became my wife <WH802>.

And it came to pass, when God <WH430> caused me to wander <WH8582> from my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, that I said <WH559> unto her, This is thy kindness <WH2617> which thou shalt shew <WH6213> unto me; at every place <WH4725> whither we shall come <WH935>, say <WH559> of me, He is my brother <WH251>.

And Abimelech <WH40> took <WH3947> sheep <WH6629>, and oxen <WH1241>, and menservants <WH5650>, and womenservants <WH8198>, and gave <WH5414> them unto Abraham <WH85>, and restored <WH7725> him Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>.
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559>, Behold, my land <WH776> is before thee <WH6440>: dwell <WH3427> where it pleaseth <WH2896> <WH5869> thee. where: Heb. as is good in thine eyes

And unto Sarah <WH8283> he said <WH559>, Behold, I have given <WH5414> thy brother <WH251> a thousand <WH505> pieces of silver <WH3701>: behold, he is to thee a covering <WH3682> of the eyes <WH5869>, unto all that are with thee, and with all other: thus she was reproved <WH3198>.
So Abraham <WH85> prayed <WH6419> unto God <WH430>: and God <WH430> healed <WH7495> Abimelech <WH40>, and his wife <WH802>, and his maidservants <WH519>; and they bare <WH3205> children.
For the LORD <WH3068> had fast <WH6113> closed up <WH6113> all the wombs <WH7358> of the house <WH1004> of Abimelech <WH40>, because <WH1697> of Sarah <WH8283> Abraham's <WH85> wife <WH802>.
